languages.text: {n}Она не лжет. По глазам и дрожащему от ревностной веры голосу вы понимаете, что Инцендия искренне верит в каждое сказанное ею слово.{/n}
{n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Она не лжет. По глазам и дрожащему от ревностной веры голосу вы понимаете, что Инцендия искренне верит в каждое сказанное ею слово.{/n}

languages.text: {n}她并没有说谎。从她的决绝的眼神与颤抖的声音中，你看得出来，因森蒂娅对她刚刚说的每个字都深信不疑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她并没有说谎。从她的决绝的眼神与颤抖的声音中，你看得出来，因森蒂娅对她刚刚说的每个字都深信不疑。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}彼女は嘘をついていなかった。その目と声は真剣な信仰で震えており、それはインセンディアが自身の心から発言していることを証明していた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女は嘘をついていなかった。その目と声は真剣な信仰で震えており、それはインセンディアが自身の心から発言していることを証明していた。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}No miente. Se le nota en la mirada y en la voz, temblorosa pero sincera, que Incendia se cree de verdad todo lo que acaba de decir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No miente. Se le nota en la mirada y en la voz, temblorosa pero sincera, que Incendia se cree de verdad todo lo que acaba de decir.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Sie lügt nicht. Du merkst an ihren Augen und ihrer Stimme, zitternd vor aufrichtigem Glauben, dass Incendia tatsächlich von jedem ihrer Worte überzeugt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie lügt nicht. Du merkst an ihren Augen und ihrer Stimme, zitternd vor aufrichtigem Glauben, dass Incendia tatsächlich von jedem ihrer Worte überzeugt ist.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Elle ne ment pas. Son regard et sa voix qui vibre d'une foi sincère indiquent clairement qu'elle croit dur comme fer à ce qu'elle dit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle ne ment pas. Son regard et sa voix qui vibre d'une foi sincère indiquent clairement qu'elle croit dur comme fer à ce qu'elle dit.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Yalan söylemiyor. Samimi bir inançla titreşen gözlerinden ve sesinden, İncendia'nın söylediği tüm sözcüklere canıgönülden inandığını anlayabiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}She is not lying. You can tell by her eyes and her voice, trembling with earnest faith, that Incendia genuinely believes in every word she just said.{/n}
